fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Check if someone is a serial killer role. If they are, attack them with one tier above their defense value

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-this role cannot spawn without more than 2 SK roles
-If you are roleblocked, you will automatically attack your roleblocker along with your target
-Roleblockers who you attack will automatically have their roleblock attempt fail
-Roleblockers that you attack will have their wills covered in blood, making it unreadable
-At night, you may choose to spare roleblockers instead
